Articles.Content: The 12th doctor will be an amalgamation of 2 6th doctors, which were further comprised of 2 3rd doctors. Therefore, if we add the 6th doctor with the 3rd doctor, and then multiply this doctor by 2, we will get the 12th doctor.
I don't know, I'd really like to see Martin Freeman do it. The way he acts would go well with the doctor's general temper.
If they could slide Morgan Freeman in there some how, I might watch the show.
Jeb, maniacally laughing at the worst the writers can throw at him. Though none of the recent companions were quite the screamers that Bill and Bob are.

Morgan Freeman would be awesome.

I think the next one is going to be female, though. But I hope not, because it would mean no more hot girl companions! Unless... nah.

No, the next Doctor is going to be John Hurt, they showed him off of the latest episode of Doctor Who

Anyhow, I like this Doctor as for he is the most like the 4th
I like the idea of john hurt,he seems like a doctor who is tired of everything accepting his death(I think it`s only 12 doctors)a woman doctor would be a nice change though.
